color-contrast.description: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

items.html: Español
If you paid out of your own pocket for things your plan covers — like healthcare services or Wellness Bucks purchases — you can send a reimbursement request to ask us to pay you back.
Once we get your request, we’ll pay you back for the amount your plan covers. We usually process requests within 30 days, but it may take up to 60 days.
This is the quickest and easiest way to get paid back:
• Log in to the Devoted member portal and choose “Get reimbursed” — or text PAYMEBACK to 866-85 to get a direct link to the right page
Log in to the Devoted member portal
• Enter your information and upload your receipt (and your detailed bill or invoice, for healthcare, dental, and vision purchases)
If you have a white and silver dental or dental/eyewear Mastercard, don't use this form. Log into your card’s account and make a payment request instead.
If you have a white and silver dental or dental/eyewear Mastercard
Log into your card’s account
There are just a few cases where the process is different. Do NOT use this form for:
Prescription Drug Reimbursement Form
Liberty Dental Reimbursement Form
Delta Dental Reimbursement Form
Prescription Drug Reimbursement Form
• Liberty Dental Reimbursement Form(for members with “Liberty Dental” on their ID card)
Liberty Dental Reimbursement Form
• Delta Dental Reimbursement Form (for members with “Delta Dental” on their ID card)
Delta Dental Reimbursement Form
• EyeMed Reimbursement Form (for members in Alabama, Arizona, Colorado, Illinois, North Carolina, Ohio, Oregon, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, or Tennessee)
Don’t have a printer? Text us at 866-85 or call us at 1-800-338-6833 (TTY 711). We can mail you a copy.
The form is an easy way to make sure you’re sending us all the right information. But if you prefer not to use it, you can send us the same information on a separate sheet of paper instead.
If you’re not sure what your plan covers — or if you run into any issues — text us at 866-85 or give us a call at 1-800-338-6833 (TTY 711). We’re happy to help.
Devoted Health Guides are here 8am to 8pm, 7 days a week.
Or call us at 1-800-DEVOTED (338–6833) TTY 711

document-title.description: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

heading-order.description: Heading levels should only increase by one

html-has-lang.description: <html> element must have a lang attribute

html-lang-valid.description: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

landmark-main-is-top-level.description: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-banner.description: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo.description: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-main.description: Document should not have more than one main landmark

landmark-one-main.description: Document should have one main landmark

link-in-text-block.description: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

list.description: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

listitem.description: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

meta-viewport-large.description: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

meta-viewport.description: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

nested-interactive.description: Interactive controls must not be nested

page-has-heading-one.description: Page should contain a level-one heading

region.description: All page content should be contained by landmarks
